scripts.rm:nm: pnpm rm -r node_modules && pnpm rm -r apps/**/node_modules && pnpm rm -r apis/**/node_modules
scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,blog,core,ai,jobs,identity -c "blue,magenta,cyan,green,yellow,orange" "pnpm dev:web" "pnpm dev:blog" "pnpm dev:core" "pnpm dev:ai" "pnpm dev:jobs" "pnpm dev:identity"
scripts.app: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev" "pnpm api"
scripts.app:build: pnpm rm:nm && pnpm i && concurrently "pnpm app:ai:build" "pnpm app:core:build" "pnpm app:jobs:build" "pnpm app:identity:build" "pnpm app:blog:build" "pnpm app:web:build"
scripts.app:identity: pnpm kill:identity && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity"
scripts.app:ai: pnpm kill:identity && pnpm kill:ai && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity" "pnpm dev:ai" "pnpm api:ai"
scripts.app:core: pnpm kill:identity &&pnpm kill:core && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity"  "pnpm dev:core" "pnpm api:core"
scripts.app:jobs: pnpm kill:identity && pnpm kill:jobs && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity" "pnpm dev:jobs" "pnpm api:jobs"
scripts.app:blog: pnpm kill:identity && pnpm kill:blog && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity" "pnpm dev:blog" "pnpm api:blog"
scripts.app:web: pnpm kill:identity && pnpm kill:core && pnpm kill:web && pnpm dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm dev:identity" "pnpm api:identity" "pnpm dev:core" "pnpm api:core" "pnpm dev:web"
